alert.note: Alert for Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 9:51AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF NORTHERN CLINTON AND NORTHERN LYCOMING COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 AM... HAZARDS...A snow squall which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. Winds will gust over 35 mph. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 949 AM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from 19 miles northwest of Wellsboro to near St. Marys and moving southeast at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED... This squall will remain over mainly rural areas of Northern Clinton and northwestern Northern Lycoming Counties. * This includes State Road 120 from Bucktail State Park to Hyner View State Park. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
